org.shared.net.handler

Class AbstractFilteredHandler<H extends AbstractFilteredHandler<H,C,T>,C extends Connection,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.net.handler.AbstractFilteredHandler<H,C,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    H - the parameterization lower bounded by AbstractFilteredHandler itself.
    C - the Connection type.
    T - the Filter inbound type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ConnectionHandler<C>, FilteredHandler<H,C,T>, OobHandler<C>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientServerTest.Utf8Handler, SynchronousHandler, XmlHandler

    public abstract class AbstractFilteredHandler<H extends AbstractFilteredHandler<H,C,T>,C extends Connection,T>
extends Object
implements FilteredHandler<H,C,T>, OobHandler<C>, Closeable
    An abstract base class implementing much of FilteredHandler.
